Text:
Thank you for all your wonderful torrents! :)
I have a request....
I downloaded your torrent "Angels Thaddeus Music by Sanaya Roman" 
which is in a folder named "Angels HQ" 

I've been downloading it for almost a year now and all files are stuck 
at 95-99.4% and it's been like that for months. There are always 
lots of leechers, but no seeders.  :(

If you'll just seed it for another 10 or 15 minutes I'll take it from there, 
and make sure all those stuck leechers get the complete file.
Thank you!
